title: Amy Plays Amnesia: The Dark Descent | The Escapist Horror Night
description:
Join our YouTube Membership program for Early Access to videos, badges, emojis, bonus content and more. ►► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqg5FCR7NrpvlBWMXdt-5Vg/join

It's Amy's turn this week to go through a horror game, and it just so happens to be one of the scariest games ever made, Amnesia: The Dark Descent. Thanks fans for donating to make this happen, she reallllly appreciates it.
